metadata.Title: CVE-2020-19131 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - negligible
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow in LibTiff v4.0.10 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice via the "invertImage()" function in the component "tiffcrop".

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-19131` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.3.0-6
libtiff-tools - 4.3.0-6
libtiff5 - 4.3.0-6
libtiffxx5 - 4.3.0-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0-6').
